replies.body:
IGN: PwnedByDylan
Age: 22
Current rank: Plat 5
Peak division: Plat 4
Position you are applying for: Support
Positions you can play at a competitive level: Support and Jungle
Top 3 champions: Janna, Thresh, Braum
Do you watch LCS or anything competitive often: Every Week
Able to download communication software: yes
TIME ZONE: CST
How much do you play League of Legends weekly: More than I care to admit
What Times/days would you not be available: i have class from 8am-2pm CST Monday, Wednesday,  Friday.
What do you look for in a team:Stabability, Seriousness, Desire to get better, play-every-day-ish
What can you bring to the team: Cookies
What makes you stand out from other players: Cookies
Competitive experience: Ive played on countless 5 teams as both support and jungle and am very vocal about making plays.
Strengths: Know what needs to be taken at any given time. 9/10 times id say that I make good calls.
Weaknesses: Cookies
